This describes how JavaFX Script ties together all the parts of the JavaFX product, and connects to the JRE and anything else that a developer would normally access.

JavaFX Script is part of the product. We need to explain how to use JFX script to manage other parts of the JavaFX product package. We will discuss language syntax, types, expressions, operations and other details in later Chapters.

sect2.title: Top Copy
sect2.para: The JavaFX Script™ (hereinafter referred to as JavaFX) language is a declarative and statically typed programming language. It has first-class functions, declarative syntax, list-comprehensions, and incremental dependency-based evaluation. The JavaFX Script language makes intensive use of the Java2D swing GUI components and allows for easy creation of GUIs.
This document gives an informal description of the JavaFX Script programming language.
